attributes.action: Don't waste money on trials for Lee Rigby's two killers
attributes.additional_details:
Lee Rigby't two killers admitted their guilt on the word stage/court, they’ve behaved like animalistic barbarians and don’t deserve our sympathy or compassion or rights. However, we’re not Barbarians so; we’ll afford them a basic human right, TO LIFE, which they robbed off poor Lee. A man who’d done nothing but be a brave soldier & loving father and husband. We shouldn’t waste a penny of tax payers’ money on trials for these thugs! Any others involved of course should be tried, the whole world knows who did what and the outcome. We ask the government: Table a motion for THESE TWO ONLY to have no trial & for the Law Lords to sentence them to Life without parole. In future if they wish to apply for parole they fund their own legal bills.

In prison they should be given basics, bed, food, clothing, washing facilities, radio, newspapers & books with restricted access, so as not to fuel their lunacy. Solitary confinement for 5 years,give them time to think about what they’ve done.
